name: Help Me Help HD
description:
An addictive action puzzle game with many levels and stages. Pinch, drag, flick, swipe and touch to play.

She needs your help! Kill enemies, destroy obstacles, and rescue the girl with a powerful deadly sling shot weapon. Drag, flick, swipe to scroll. Pinch to zoom.

Features:
- Addictive game play.
- Levels and stages.
- Unlimited challenges.
- Automatic saving of games, always come back to the game right where you left it.
- Highscores.
- Support Game Center (groups).
- Stunning graphics and animations.
- High quality game music and sound effects.
- Support for playing your own music during game play by turning off the game audio.
- Supports fast app switching on multitasking devices.
